Paired t-test

The values represent the numbers of points approached during the examination. Check whether the additional lectures had any positive effect:

title: Kids Screen Time Analysis
text:
Wilcoxon test (optional)
The Mann-Whitney and Wilxon tests are nonparametric tests of location. ‚ÄúNonparametric‚Äù means, that the general location of the distributions is compared and not a parameter like the mean. This makes the test independent of distributional assumptions, but can sometimes lead to a vague interpretations.

Introduction
Taken from Agresti (2002), Fisher‚Äôs Tea Drinker:
‚ÄúA British woman claimed to be able to distinguish whether milk or tea was added to the cup first. To test, she was given 8 cups of tea, in four of which milk was added first. The null hypothesis is that there is no association between the true order of pouring and the woman‚Äôs guess, the alternative that there is a positive association (that the odds ratio is greater than 1).‚Äù

2. M√©thodologie
Le workflow g√©n√©ral suivi est le suivant :

## Introduction

**Contexte :** L‚Äôusage des technologies num√©riques transforme profond√©ment le quotidien des enfants, surtout dans les pays √©mergents.  
L‚Äôacc√®s aux smartphones, tablettes et t√©l√©viseurs s‚Äôest fortement d√©mocratis√© ces 10 derni√®res ann√©es.

**Enjeux :** Cette transition soul√®ve des pr√©occupations de sant√© publique, notamment chez les enfants et adolescents, population particuli√®rement vuln√©rable aux effets d‚Äôune **exposition prolong√©e aux √©crans**.

## √âtude et objectifs

- **√âchantillon :** 9 668 enfants indiens
